about.title: About me
about.description1: Since I was a child, technology has been my passion. My first encounters with computers and fascination with how programs worked guided me towards computing.
about.description2: Over time, my interest grew and I began to explore
about.description3: He spent hours dismantling and assembling computers, understanding the purpose of each component.
about.description4: This passion led me to study
about.description5: at the Institute of {{0}}. I have worked on various projects, applying and expanding my knowledge. Each project is a new challenge and an opportunity to grow personally and professionally.
about.description6: I hope to continue developing my career, acquiring new skills and contributing my knowledge and experience.
